subject: Move Sample Images after Layout and fix markdown CSS
body:
- Sample Images section now appears after Layout in Presets tab
- Sample Images collapsed by default instead of auto-expanding
- Fix list rendering: add list-style-type for ul (disc) and ol (decimal)
  which Tailwind's preflight strips
- Add h4, pre, pre code, and nested list styling for markdown
- Separate ul/ol rules for proper list-style-type restoration

https://claude.ai/code/session_01NFd5wfEQCn6KwD5ZnipfYq
title: Move Sample Images after Layout and fix markdown CSS
